name: YoutubeFixSABR
author: kafeijao
description:
Fixes youtube urls not loading on the video player due lack of SABR streaming support. It downloads deno.exe and modify the yt-dlp args to make use of it.

- **Note1:** This downloads the js runtime deno.exe onto the mod data folder
- **Note2:** By default this uses the nightly yt-dlp since the current stable results in crusty quality (there is a setting to disable nightly)
- **Note3:** You can customize the arguments to remove and add in melon prefs (file only)

-# Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/YoutubeFixSABR) for more in-depth info.
